title: The Silvyr Tower
description:
This ready to play adventure is designed for all players of D&D 5E--whether novice or veteran. It is written in such a way to be easy-to-follow for new DMs, and uses the free Basic Rules that can be downloaded from the Wizards of the Coast Website. It also includes all creature and item stat blocks.

This adventure is written for 3-5 adventurers of level 2-4 (Tips will be given for scaling the encounters for more or fewer players).

By levenimc
